item.title: Rubbish outside my home left by cleaner, 14th November
item.description:
12 bags of leaves left outside my house. I’m disabled and also have a recent problem with bin collection also. Never had a problem before.

item.title: Constant rubbish and furniture, 14th November
item.description:
Carpark area behind flats. There is constant rubbish in this area for years.. it gets cleared and within a month it builds up again. The bins are never emptied as they are not roadside. The landlords of these properties do nothing. Enforcement office can contact them? Trying to sell my flat opposite with difficulty because of this eyesore. Attracts vermin, rats, foxes Many families with young children live in close proximity to these dangerous pile ups. If the council cannot clear it, can the landlords be fined?? Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mineral Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of a single bed divan, mattress and head board, 14th November
item.description:
They are behind the lamp post under the Strandfield Close road sign. As you go from Tewson Road into Strandfield Close - opposite the post box. In the photo - there is a camera on the corner of where they were flytipped. Not sure who the camera belongs to. I’ve only noticed the items there since yesterday (13tb Nov) but could have been there longer.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tewson Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping and general waste/Bin 2, 14th November
item.description:
There's been a large amount of dumped materials outside our building that hasn't been removed for over a month now, next to both bin areas (please find the photos attached regarding one of Bin 2 under tree next to road: bed frame, bed side table and other furniture/general waste on the floor that the council waste collection don't collect). It really is a shame to see our neighborhood like this. Your help clearing this out is always much appreciated! Please help us. Kind regards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Acanthus Drive, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping and general waste, 14th November
item.description:
There's been a large amount of dumped materials outside our building that hasn't been removed for over a month now, next to both bin areas (please find the photos attached regarding one of these bins. Bin 1 in front of car park: bed mattresses/bed frames and general waste on the floor that the council waste collection don't collect). It really is a shame to see our neighborhood like this. Your help clearing this out is always much appreciated! Please help us. Kind regards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Acanthus Drive, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
